name: Pillow Cushion Cover - Blue Yellow Umbrella and Stripes, Reversible with Zipper
description:
Beach umbrellas and stripes in periwinkle, capri blue and yellow on an ivory background . 

Reversible: One side has multi-colored umbrellas, and the other side is in a striped coordinating fabric. Finished with an invisible zipper closure. Fine quality Kaufmann designer fabric.

~ ONE PILLOW COVER - 18x18 inch

~ I create all of my pillow covers with specially selected, high quality home decor textiles - each one professionally finished.

100% Cotton
Dry Cleaning Recommended

> Insert NOT included <

name: Pillow Cushion Cover, Modern Tan Blue Chevron with Zipper
description:
DESIGNER COLLECTION
The latest modern design in multi-shaded blues, tans and browns. Large abstract chevron print design on both sides with a zipper enclosure. Eye-catching yet sophisticated -- easily adds flare to your home! 

This exclusive cover is made with a high-end designer fabric by Robert Allen. 

~ I create all of my pillow covers with specially selected, high quality home decor textiles - each one professionally finished.

100% Cotton
Dry Cleaning Recommended.

> Insert NOT included <
